resources.string: You do not have root privilages!
Do you want to remove the property:\n\"%s\"?
Are you sure to reboot your device?
Are you sure to reload the build.prop file?\nBy reloading the file you will lose all modifications.
Are you sure to restore your build.prop file?\nBy restoring the file you will lose all modifications.
Backing up the old file was failed!
Moving up the new file was failed!
The destination folder should not be null!
The destination folder %s does not exist!
Chose a folder to save current properties. Default is your external phone storage, SD Card.
You do not provided any folder name!
If you appreciate this application, please do a donation!\nPressing YES button, you will be sent using your default browser to a PayPal donnation page.\nThank you for using this application!

string.name: about_text
string.Data:
Application version: %s
I created this application to change the host name for my phone.
Using this application you can view and modify all properties from your build.prop file.
This file is important for your Android system and is stored on the /system partition.
Normaly the full path is: /system/build.prop

Thank you for using this application!

Change log:
Version 1.9.2
- Modified about window to use scroll view.

Version 1.9
- A fix related with the permission issues.

Version 1.8
- Small minor fixes.

Version 1.7
- Added reboot option, for rooted phones.

Version 1.6
- Refactored the OK and Cancel buttons positions.

Version 1.5
- Replaced the long click with simple click to access the context menu.

Version 1.4.2
- Small fix related with the properties list modifications.

Version 1.4.1
- Added a confirmation dialog when the list is reloading.

Version 1.4
- Added donation link.

Version 1.3
- Added an alert dialog to be showed the error messages.

Version 1.2.7
- Fixed restore function.

Version 1.2.6
- Changed the root command invocations.

Version 1.2.5
- Fix: mounting system partition only if is necessary.

Version 1.2.4
- Changed fast scroll style (beta).
- Fixed rotate behaviour.

Version 1.2.3
- Added folder icons for the folder browser.
- Other small fixes.

Version 1.2.2
- Fixed about text.

Version 1.2.1
- Minor fix on the folder browser.

Version 1.2
- Added support to save the build.prop file to a chosen folder, default is the SD card.

Version 1.1
- Added support to restore the original build.prop file.

Version 1.0
- First version.
